title: "Self-Suggestion Technique for Complete Polarization of Being"
first_phrase: In this final section, we will focus on the importance of concentration and self-suggestion in achieving our desired attitudes and qualities. The exercise involves visualizing a symbol or image and using energetic diffusion to polarize your entire being. The goal is to attain a state of complete relaxation and concentration, which will lead to restful sleep and access to the state of dreaming, where our true selves reside. This practice was described by Emile Coue, a French psychologist and pharmacist, who believed in the power of the imagination to heal and transform the self.

last_phrase: In conclusion, this exercise aims to promote circulation, homogenization, and connection with the infinite. To fully benefit from this practice, it is essential to follow all the steps and immediately enter a state of deep sleep. By accessing this level, we can dissolve our temporary patterns and construct a new way of being. Remember to relax and allow yourself to explore the threshold of consciousness beyond our everyday reality.
